sentences.english: Never far from her work, the mistress of the web patiently waits.
sentences.chinese: 蛛網的女主人永遠守在自己的作品邊，耐心的等候。

sentences.english: I worked with the patience of a redwood growing rings.
sentences.chinese: 我這種耐心，堪與紅杉樹長年輪媲美。

sentences.english: I will talk about abilities in the next piece, please be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我會在下一章講到能力，請耐心等待。

sentences.english: Love is patience of awaiting slow growth of its meaning as time elapses.
sentences.chinese: 愛是耐心，是等待意義在時間中慢慢生成。

sentences.english: And the patience of the tortoise but not the slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 要有烏龜的耐心但又不能太慢。

sentences.english: Ambition is alot like love, impatient both of delays and rivals.
sentences.chinese: 壯志雄心和愛情一樣，都總是遲到並對對手失去耐心。

sentences.english: I very much worth looking, you need the patience looking.
sentences.chinese: 我長得很耐看，你需要耐心的看。

sentences.english: Wanying smoothed the fragments patiently and reordered them together. Then she attentively read the letter twice.
sentences.chinese: 宛英耐心撫平團皺的碎片，一一拼上，仔細讀了兩遍。

sentences.english: Try to be patient with Mrs. Tanner, she means well.
sentences.chinese: 對杜納太太要耐心點，她是好意的。

sentences.english: Patience, for Macheda, may well be the key in the next nine months.
sentences.chinese: 耐心等待，將是他未來的九個月中的重點。

sentences.english: That young teacher was too quick with her students.
sentences.chinese: 那位年輕教師對學生太不耐心。

sentences.english: You have lost heart, faith and patience.
sentences.chinese: 你已經開始失去滿腔的熱情，信心和耐心。

sentences.english: They queued patiently to get into the auditorium.
sentences.chinese: 他們耐心地排隊進入禮堂。

sentences.english: I patiently filled him in on the British tradition of sherry tippling .
sentences.chinese: 我耐心細緻地給他講述了英國人暢飲雪利酒的傳統。

sentences.english: When it comes to hiring contractors, again I will ask you to wait.
sentences.chinese: 當涉及到僱用承包商的時候，我再次請求你耐心等待。

definition: conscientious/earnest/serious/to take seriously/to take to heart
